PersistedMetaNode.description:
Meta node to write PLANTS session directory with config, ligands and protein files.

%%00013%%00010Port 0 should have a single row with the following columns:%%00013%%00010
    %%00013%%00010
  • session_dir: Directory name of session as a string
    • %%00013%%00010
  • protein: Protein in mol2 format
    • %%00013%%00010
%%00013%%00010%%00013%%00010Port 1 should have following columns:%%00013%%00010
    %%00013%%00010
  • Molecule: Ligand in mol2 format
    • %%00013%%00010
PersistedMetaNode.name: PLANTS session builder
